description: Implement Sheet overlay component (~150 lines) for slide-in panels. Includes: Sheet root (DialogTrigger), Sheet.Content (overlay panel), Sheet.Header, Sheet.Body, Sheet.Footer. Uses Object.assign pattern, frozen B constant with CSS variable slots, position variants (left/right/top/bottom), useTooltip integration, focus trapping, and data-* attributes (data-position, data-open). Reference: modal.tsx for overlay pattern.
title: Sheet overlay component
